definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

sentences.english: The harmfulness of eunuch to political chaos is rare in ancient history.

definition: to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
laws and discipline of imperial court
(of a warlord etc) to assemble one's personal army, thereby presenting a challenge to the central government
Ten Permanent Functionaries at the end of Han, a byword for corruption
to hold a court audience/to govern from the imperial throne (applies esp. to Empress Dowager or Regent)
